Class TeleporterAnimationController

PropAnimationController
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.TeleporterAnimationController
public class TeleporterAnimationController extends PropAnimationController
Animation controller for Teleporter entities. Selects between an open and closed sprite depending on the number of remaining crystals in the game logic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TeleporterAnimationController(Teleporter prop)
    Constructs a TeleporterAnimationController for the given teleporter prop.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BufferedImage
    getCurrentImage()
    Returns the current sprite image for the teleporter.

  • Constructor Details

    • TeleporterAnimationController

      public TeleporterAnimationController(Teleporter prop)
      Constructs a TeleporterAnimationController for the given teleporter prop.
      Parameters:
      prop - the teleporter entity whose animation controller is being created

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentImage

      public BufferedImage getCurrentImage()
      Returns the current sprite image for the teleporter. The teleporter appears closed while crystals remain, and open once all required crystals have been collected.
      Returns:
      the appropriate teleporter sprite based on game state
